alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 10:07PM EDT until August 24 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR LIVINGSTON AND NORTHWESTERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 1006 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Milford to near Ann Arbor to 9 miles northeast of Jonesville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Ann Arbor around 1010 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Delhi Mills, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Hudson Mills, Parkers Corners, Lakeland, Lyndon Township and Chilson. People attending Chelsea Community Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
